title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD
notes: Default controller settings unusable, needed to manually edit settings to fix

cpu: AMD A10-4600M APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics
notes: 1st attempt to start failed. 2nd attempt to start got to the title screen, but them locked up requiring switching to terminal to kill stranger.exe in order to recover graphical session.
title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD

notes: Starts just fine, but flickers on the cutscenes, and suddenly everything in the game turns black (except for the menu).
title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD

notes: Retested. With Shadows off, works flawlessly. With Shadows on, flickers during in-game cutscenes and after the second cutscene all the textures turns black.
title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD

notes: Works perfectly even with shadows on. Steam overlay and Steam Controller working just fine.
title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD

notes: Unable to move unless you jump or attack.  Every time you stop running you will have to jump or attack to move again.  Performance however, is excellent.
title: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath HD
